Good evening,

am Subbarao Upoala, your client from Hyderabad, PIN code 500060 for
purchase of medicines for the last two three month vide through my contact
number

Four days back on Thursday, I received a message crowding Rs 75.00 in pharm
easy wallet

Today, I have given medicines ordered but the said amount was not adjusted

I received a call from your doctor and your executive today evening at
about 5.30 for confirmation of my order, I replied as “yes”
I tried to make payment through phone pay but it was failed (I don’t know
the reason) and ordered medicines with COD (o will make the payment through
phone pay only by scanning)

Please see that to reduce Rs 75.00 from the cost of medicines which are
expected tomorrow evening

Please do necessary as per my request as am 69 years old citizen

I will become continuous purchaser by ordering other medicines for BP also
in addition to Ashtma from you  depends upon your service

Thank you and expect your favourable decision


Your faithfully


Uppala Subbarao
9490702654

helpdesk_ticket.description_html:
Good evening,

am Subbarao Upoala, your client from Hyderabad, PIN code 500060 for purchase of medicines for the last two three month vide through my contact number 

Four days back on Thursday, I received a message crowding Rs 75.00 in pharm easy wallet 

Today, I have given medicines ordered but the said amount was not adjusted

I received a call from your doctor and your executive today evening at about 5.30 for confirmation of my order, I replied as “yes”
I tried to make payment through phone pay but it was failed (I don’t know the reason) and ordered medicines with COD (o will make the payment through phone pay only by scanning)

Please see that to reduce Rs 75.00 from the cost of medicines which are expected tomorrow evening 

Please do necessary as per my request as am 69 years old citizen 

I will become continuous purchaser by ordering other medicines for BP also in addition to Ashtma from you  depends upon your service 

Thank you and expect your favourable decision


Your faithfully 


Uppala Subbarao

notes.body: Hello Subba,  ​    Greetings from PharmEasy!      This email is in regard to your concern raised with us. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.     With regards to your query, I would like to inform you that PharmEasy wallet amount deposited in your PharmEasy wallet through returns will never expire. However, the cashback received against a coupon code applied to the order has an expiry.      Further, I see that Rs.75 was added to your wallet as a special reward. The special reward was valid till 07th December 2025. The wallet was not utilized within the validity, hence, the amount expired from your wallet.     As per the recent order, you can make a payment at the time of the delivery for all three shipments. Also, you can make payment via QR.     I hope this addresses your query.     For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Subba,
​
Greetings from PharmEasy! 

This email is in regard to your concern raised with us. I apologize for the inconvenience caused to you.

With regards to your query, I would like to inform you that PharmEasy wallet amount deposited in your PharmEasy wallet through returns will never expire. However, the cashback received against a coupon code applied to the order has an expiry. 

Further, I see that Rs.75 was added to your wallet as a special reward. The special reward was valid till 07th December 2025. The wallet was not utilized within the validity, hence, the amount expired from your wallet.

As per the recent order, you can make a payment at the time of the delivery for all three shipments. Also, you can make payment via QR.
 
I hope this addresses your query.

For any further assistance, please reach out to us through our support channels in the App or website listed in the 'Need Help' section.

 Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Stay Healthy.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

Dear sir,

I remember on 4th or 5th this month, i wanted order the medicines and found
that Rs 75.00 adjusted but I didn’t ordered as I have to attend one
function in our relatives house far away from Hyderabad and returned today
and give order for medicines and found that it’s not adjusted and hence
bring into your notice
You please can check with the representative whoever told it’s  over and
adjusted
You can search for my purchases/orders upto date whether there was any
order after giving credit if Rs 75.00 to my Walket ( after the message
received four days back on 3rd or 4th and No orders from me after the said
date)

Yours faithfully,

Subbarao Uppala

notes.body:
Sir,
Thank you for quick response
No date was mentioned in the message for validity/expiry of the credits
I could not ordered as I was out of station from 5th to 8th evening to
attend one important function at my relatives house which is far away from
Hyderabad and non is available to make payment and take delivery of the
same
If there’s any validity date , I would have arrange alternative for making
payment/ accepting delivery in my absense

I ordered medicines today immediately after reaching home to have the
benefit of credit, even no urgency of medicine at present

I request your good offices to adjust the Sai’s credit by adjusting in this
order which is expected to receive tomorrow evening

Please do it as a special case to this 69 year old citizen and I assure you
to continue the relation in purchase of various other medicines also  and
expect your favourable decision action by discussing with your competent
authority


Thank you

Yours faithfully

Uppala Subbarao

notes.body:
Good morning sir,

It’s surprising to note that the following

1. It’s good giving special reward by way of credits to my wallet on
03.12.2025 but without validity date means discouraging by keeping me blind

2. I would have ordered before 07.12.2025 , if I know the expiry date

3. I ordered immediately I returned from function on 08.12.2025 with a view
that I get the benefit with special reward, Even though I don’t need it any
medicine urgency

4. Try to adjust the same Rs 75.00 in my yesterday’s order by today evening
before I receive

Thank you and expecting four able decision to keep me well satisfied senior
citizen of aged 69 years

Good day and leave the decision to you

Yours Gaulish fully

Uppala Subbarao

notes.body: Hello,       Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regard to your concern. I will surely assist you with this. However, the email ID from which you have sent this email is not registered with us.     For verification purposes, please help me with your registered mobile number and registered email ID.     Kindly share the mobile number you wish to unsubscribe from promotional SMS, so that we can assist you more effectively.     Please be informed that we are unable to comply with his request to erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant government authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.     Let me inform you that once the account is deactivated, we cannot process any requests or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on the registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation.      If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you with the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.   ​   Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

With regard to your concern. I will surely assist you with this. However, the email ID from which you have sent this email is not registered with us.

For verification purposes, please help me with your registered mobile number and registered email ID.

Kindly share the mobile number you wish to unsubscribe from promotional SMS, so that we can assist you more effectively.

Please be informed that we are unable to comply with his request to erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant government authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.
 
Let me inform you that once the account is deactivated, we cannot process any requests or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on the registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. 

If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you with the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account. 
​
Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Ankita,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     Please be informed that we are unable to comply with his request to erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant government authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.     Let me inform you that once the account is deactivated, we cannot process any requests or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on the registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation.      If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you with the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.      Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Ankita,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

Please be informed that we are unable to comply with his request to erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant government authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.
 
Let me inform you that once the account is deactivated, we cannot process any requests or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on the registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. 

If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you with the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account. 

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body_html:
Hello Ankita,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

Please be informed that we are unable to comply with his request to erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant government authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.
 
Let me inform you that once the account is deactivated, we cannot process any requests or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on the registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. 

If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you with the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account. 

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Rahul,     Greetings from PharmEasy!      I am sorry to hear that you wish to deactivate your PharmEasy account.    I have forwarded your account deactivation request to our escalations team. Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out within 24 to 48 hours to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation.      If yes, an OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.   Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.   Regards,  Neeha
notes.body_html:
Hello Rahul,

Greetings from PharmEasy! 

I am sorry to hear that you wish to deactivate your PharmEasy account. 

I have forwarded your account deactivation request to our escalations team. Let me inform you that, once the account is deactivated then we cannot process any request or reactivate the account. Once confirmed our team will reach out within 24 to 48 hours to complete the account deactivation process on a registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. 

If yes, an OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you to the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.

Your patience and understanding are highly appreciated in the meantime.

Regards,
Neeha

notes.body: Hello Rahul,     Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with regards to your concern raised about account deactivation.     Please note that as discussed with our team member, you have requested to stop promotional SMS and calls.     With regards to the promotional notifications, we always try to keep our customers updated on our offers. However, we apologize for the inconvenience caused due to our promotional messages.     Please be assured, we have forwarded your request to unsubscribe your number '9315128983' from getting the promotional notifications. It will take 3 business days to process it completely. You will only receive your order-related information. Also, if you have a dual sim phone, We would request you to help us with the second number as well, we will forward a request for the other number as well.      Further, if you wish to unsubscribe from getting the promotional notifications on your email id too, we request you to open your latest promotional email and hit unsubscribe at the bottom right-hand side corner to stop email promotions.     We certainly hope this helps and appreciate your understanding and patience in the meanwhile.      For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, marked din the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,  PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Rahul,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

This email is with regards to your concern raised about account deactivation.

Please note that as discussed with our team member, you have requested to stop promotional SMS and calls.
 
With regards to the promotional notifications, we always try to keep our customers updated on our offers. However, we apologize for the inconvenience caused due to our promotional messages.
 
Please be assured, we have forwarded your request to unsubscribe your number '9315128983' from getting the promotional notifications. It will take 3 business days to process it completely. You will only receive your order-related information. Also, if you have a dual sim phone, We would request you to help us with the second number as well, we will forward a request for the other number as well. 
 
Further, if you wish to unsubscribe from getting the promotional notifications on your email id too, we request you to open your latest promotional email and hit unsubscribe at the bottom right-hand side corner to stop email promotions.
 
We certainly hope this helps and appreciate your understanding and patience in the meanwhile. 
 
For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, marked din the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!
 
Regards,
PharmEasy

Hello Dr. Draun,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with regards to your order # 656045796265066496-75305, we apologize for the inconvenience caused to you with your order.
 
Please note that our team tried calling you multiple times on 8377963842 , however you were non contactable.
 
As per update received from our team, please be informed that as per our records the order has been delivered to you.
 
We request you to confirm whether you have received the order or not for further assistance?

notes.body: Hello Varun,      Greetings from PharmEasy!     With regard to promotional SMS, we always try to keep our customers updated on our offers. However, we apologize for the inconvenience caused due to our promotional messages.     Please be assured, I have forwarded your request to unsubscribe your number 9685135009 from receiving promotional SMS. It will take 3 working days to process it completely. You will only receive your order-related information. Also, if you have a dual SIM phone, I would request you to help us with the second number as well. We will forward a request for the other number as well.      Further, if you wish to unsubscribe from getting the promotional notifications on your email ID too, I request you to open your latest promotional email and hit unsubscribe at the bottom right-hand side corner to stop email promotions.     I certainly hope this helps and appreciate your understanding and patience in the meanwhile.      Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Varun,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

With regard to promotional SMS, we always try to keep our customers updated on our offers. However, we apologize for the inconvenience caused due to our promotional messages.

Please be assured, I have forwarded your request to unsubscribe your number 9685135009 from receiving promotional SMS. It will take 3 working days to process it completely. You will only receive your order-related information. Also, if you have a dual SIM phone, I would request you to help us with the second number as well. We will forward a request for the other number as well. 

Further, if you wish to unsubscribe from getting the promotional notifications on your email ID too, I request you to open your latest promotional email and hit unsubscribe at the bottom right-hand side corner to stop email promotions.

I certainly hope this helps and appreciate your understanding and patience in the meanwhile. 

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Anirban Mandal,    Greetings from PharmEasy!     This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #656636542512336896-92584.     We have received an update from our logistics team that your order has been delivered. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.     Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.     We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.     For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section.      Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!     Regards,   PharmEasy
notes.body_html:
Hello Anirban Mandal,

Greetings from PharmEasy!
 
This email is with reference to the concern raised for order #656636542512336896-92584.
 
We have received an update from our logistics team that your order has been delivered. Please accept my sincere apology for the inconvenience caused to you. We have shared the required feedback with the delivery agent and we will make sure that such instances are not repeated in the future.
 
Please consider this as a one-off instance as we aim to provide the best of services to our customers and such instances are very rare.

We are marking the ticket as resolved. PharmEasy looks forward to bettering your experience in the future.

For any further assistance, please reopen this ticket or reach out to us through our support channels, in the App or website, listed in the 'Need Help' section. 
 
Thank you for choosing PharmEasy. Have a great day ahead!

Regards, 
PharmEasy

notes.body: Hello Suresh,      Greetings from PharmEasy!       I am sorry to know that you are unable to operate the PharmEasy application. We aim to provide the best service. However, situations like these are rare.      Please be informed that at times, due to network issues, you may face such technical issues. As a quick fix, I request that you clear your browsing cookies and cache and reinstall your PharmEasy application and connect to a stable network. If you face any difficulty while operating it, please get back to us with an error screenshot so that we can check the same and assist you better.   ​   Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal

notes.body: Hello Pavan,       Greetings from PharmEasy!     Please be informed that we are unable to comply with his request to erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant government authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.     Let me inform you that once the account is deactivated, we cannot process any requests or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on the registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation.      If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you with the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account.      Awaiting your response.     Regards,  Sandhya Nackwal
notes.body_html:
Hello Pavan,

Greetings from PharmEasy!

Please be informed that we are unable to comply with his request to erase the data. We have to produce/show any or all transactions or interactions, past or present, when asked for by relevant government authorities. However, please confirm if you wish to deactivate your account.
 
Let me inform you that once the account is deactivated, we cannot process any requests or reactivate the account. Once confirmed, our team will reach out to complete the account deactivation process on the registered mobile number to confirm if you requested account deactivation. 

If yes, OTP will be generated and will be sent to your registered mobile number. Once the OTP is shared by you with the team, they will go ahead and block the customer's account. 

Awaiting your response.

Regards,
Sandhya Nackwal
